title: In Her Eyes
description: Ten years ago Rachel Burn was a brilliant, kind, happy, energetic, and outgoing young lady. Or so she has been told. Rachel remembers nothing of her life before a gunman shot her in the head at point-blank range taking from her all of her memories of her previous life. Through no small miracle, Rachel survived the incident, but not fully intact. A decade later she is a vicious shell of a woman hell-bent on the destruction of her life and anyone who would get in her way.All of this suddenly changes when a daring stranger walks out of Rachel's past to tell her that her life is not what she has been told. The arrival of this ghost sparks a series of events that puts Rachel in pursuit of a past life made new. She realizes that her new life is both worth living and worth fighting for as the powers that be rise up to try to kill her. Follow Rachel as she fights to unravel her past before it ends her future.
author: T.R. Jones
